isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 2000, 4000, 8000 - ELECTRONIC ENGINES, CATERPILLAR C-10 AND C-12 ENGINES - OPERATION - ATA Datalink Connector

svcproc.title: ATA Datalink Connector
svcproc.para: Connector (68) is located on left instrument panel. Four of the six connector cavities have terminals. Those terminals and connecting circuits are as follows:

item.para: Circuit 98A(+) is the positive data link connection, and it is fed by the positive data link connector (427), connector (3), circuit 98A(+) and circuit 98(+) coming from the ECM connector (1014).
Circuit 98C(-) is the negative data link connection, and it is fed by the negative data link connector (428), circuit 98B(-), connector (3), and circuit 98B(-) coming from the ECM connector (1014).

Circuit 97DL is a 12 volt feed and is fed from bat stud, junction block (J1), circuit 15, key switch (24), circuit 13A, 10A fuse F5-B, circuit 97DL, and connector (333). Thus, it provides power for the electronic service tool.
Circuit 11-GL is connected to the panel light ground adapter cab ground terminal and provides a ground for the electronic service tool.
